localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: ICONFi is a digital asset savings platform. ICONFi lets you earn interest on your digital assets including BTC, ETH, ICX, and USDT, and provides a simple solution for staking ICX. ICONFi helps you grow your investments with a simple, secure user interface.
nodes.title: ICONFi - Keep your savings simple with ICONFi.
nodes.author: Molly Waldron

nodes.excerpt: Plan the things you love to do with your friends both online and in person. Make plans with friends, share plans, see what others are up to, and keep track of upcoming events. Plan get-togethers, brunch, study sessions, your next date, you name it!
nodes.title: Planmesh - The easiest way to plan with friends
nodes.author: Jose Togbe

nodes.excerpt: Daily prompts and inspiration to get your creativity flowing, and a wonderful community of artists to support you as you grow. I made it to get my mum to start drawing again, and now we get over 1000 submissions a day! Available on iOS and Android
nodes.title: Sketch a Day: artist community & prompts - Daily prompts, powered by our positive community of artists
nodes.author: Tom Hicks

nodes.excerpt: Bullet is a mobile and web app that helps you manage your tasks & events, and write your journal all in the same place. Inspired by the popular Bullet Journaling methodology.
nodes.title: Bullet Mobile - Manage your tasks, events and journal all on your mobile.
nodes.author: Hamish Johnson

nodes.excerpt: Canary Mail brings a simple design, powerful feature-set, and easy-to-use email encryption. Now on Android.
nodes.title: Canary Mail - Privacy-friendly email app for macOS, iOS & Android
nodes.author: Sohel Sanghani

nodes.excerpt: A beautiful photo and video editor for social media. â € Plus powerful branding tools and templates. â € Create and plan in one.

nodes.excerpt: Free mobile app that helps the 50 million microbusinesses in Latin America become more efficient. The app allows owners to record transactions, track credits and debits, see business statistics, gain control over their inventory, among many other things.
nodes.title: Treinta - Digital ledger app for Latin American microbusinesses
nodes.author: Man Hei Lou

nodes.excerpt: Expand your skills as an artist with daily art challenges. Categories include drawing, photography, painting, and typography. The best way to improve is daily practice. Challenge yourself and your friends to create something new every day with Creact!
nodes.title: Creact - Daily art & drawing challenges to improve your art skills
nodes.author: Brian Hulme

nodes.excerpt: Website peace of mind. Haark keeps track of all of your websites and makes sure youâ€™re the first to know if theyâ€™re down. Developers and project teams alike use Haark as their early warning system so they can be on their A-game with clients.
nodes.title: Haark - Monitors your sites and notifies you if they're down

nodes.title: Signils - Better Management of Bluetooth and Locate Lost Devices
nodes.author: Steve Smith

nodes.excerpt: The YouTuber ATM machine. Creator Cash allows you to access YouTube earnings immediately. No more waiting an entire month to get paid. Uploaded a video today? Get paid today! Coupled with earnings analytics, Creator Cash is the financial hub for YouTubers.
nodes.title: Creator Cash - The app for creators to get paid without waiting

nodes.excerpt: LivingWriter is the best writing app available right now. It takes all the features of Scrivener and other such apps and makes it all modern, clean and beautiful. Start your book, plot your book, write your book, and organize your book all in one place.
nodes.title: LivingWriter - The Best Writing App - All the features for novel writing in one clean package.
nodes.author: Casey Kerbs

nodes.excerpt: Plan a full week of meals with a single click. Just tell us which foods you like, and how many calories, protein, fat, and carbs you want to eat. Swap out a meal, a day, or a week! We can fit in your treats, and even give you a grocery list!
nodes.title: Prospre - Generate custom meal plans with one click
nodes.author: Colin Hunt

nodes.excerpt: Wrekt is a social deduction game meant to be played with groups. Use it to split the bill at the end of a meal or just play for fun!
nodes.title: Wrekt - A social deduction bill splitting game
nodes.author: andy wang

nodes.excerpt: My Wolfpack is a friendly app that microgroups people according to their interests. If you are not particularly looking for dating but donâ€™t want to meet people in huge groups that forbids you to really get to know them, you are in the right place.
nodes.title: My Wolfpack - Meet new friends according to your interests in micro-groups
nodes.author: Murat Aksu

nodes.excerpt: Your Week is a simple weekly planner that I built to help me plan my priorities at the start of the week. It has a clear week-based layout and provides a helpful reminder to plan each week. Try it at https://yourweek.app or get the Android app.
nodes.title: Your Week - Hold yourself accountable to weekly goals and priorities.
nodes.author: Graham Macphee

nodes.excerpt: Resold is a marketplace for people to buy & sell with same-day delivery. 1. List a piece of furniture on Resold 2. Request an Uber driver to have your furniture delivered in minutes. 3. Payment is delivered direct to your bank account.
nodes.title: Resold - Buy & sell with same-day delivery
nodes.author: Joe Kuczek

nodes.excerpt: App Mockup is the design tool to create the most compelling screenshots for the App Store and Google Play. No account required.
nodes.title: App Screenshot Mockup - Make perfect screenshots for mobile apps
nodes.author: John

nodes.excerpt: GlamAR is a virtual makeup try-on, designed for beauty and cosmetic brands. Integrate with your brand website or app to help customers try-on products live, directly from their mobile or laptop.
nodes.title: GlamAR - Augmented Reality platform for a seamless try on experience
nodes.author: Farooq Adam

nodes.excerpt: The Med&Beyond telehealth app offers you a video visit with an online doctor 24/7 without leaving your home or office. Install our app and access a board-certified doctor on demand anytime, without the need for health insurance.
nodes.title: Med & Beyond - Ask a real doctor 24/7
nodes.author: Samuel alex
